original_text: With the hoofs of his horses he will trample all your streets. He will kill your people with the sword, and your mighty pillars will fall to the ground.
korean_text: 그가 그 말굽으로 네 모든 거리를 밟을 것이며 칼로 네 백성을 죽일 것이며 네 견고한 석상을 땅에 엎드러뜨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: With the hoofs of his horses
he will trample all your streets
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너의 모든 거리를 짓밟을 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will kill your people with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 칼로 너의 백성을 죽일 것이다

sentences.original_text: your mighty pillars will fall to the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 튼튼한 기둥들이 땅에 쓰러질 것이다
